name: enumerateLineFragments(forGlyphRange:using:)
desc: Enumerates line fragments intersecting with the specified glyph range.
declaration:
func enumerateLineFragments(forGlyphRange glyphRange: NSRange, 
                      using block: @escaping (CGRect, CGRect, NSTextContainer, NSRange, UnsafeMutablePointer<ObjCBool>) -> Void)
